summary: Email chain between Parvin Daphne Moyne of Akin Gump law firm and an external recipient regarding an upcoming Wall Street Journal article about Jeffrey Epstein. The email flags that the article will mention Deutsche Bank and Epstein's charity Gratitude America holding accounts at the bank.

keyFacts: Deutsche Bank received information about an upcoming Wall Street Journal article related to Jeffrey Epstein that would mention the bank.
The article reports that Epstein controlled a charity called Gratitude America that held accounts at Deutsche Bank.
Attorney Parvin Daphne Moyne of Akin Gump law firm was communicating about this matter, suggesting legal representation or advisory role regarding Epstein's financial connections.
The email correspondence shows proactive communication about potential negative publicity related to Epstein's banking relationships.
